name: Hello Kitty to Mahou no Apron: Rhythm Cooking
name_original: Hello Kitty to Mahou no Apron: Rhythm Cooking
description:
Hello Kitty to Mahou no Apron: Rhythm Cooking is an arcade game developed by EXAMU. It was originally released in 2013. Examu published the game.
You can play Hello Kitty to Mahou no Apron: Rhythm Cooking on Nintendo 3DS.
